page.title: 14Bracknell Children's Game
page.content: "DON'T STEP ON THE EGGS" This is a game played at parties.You can play this game with as many people as you want. You have 4 people to set it out. They lay some eggs out in a row - well spaced.You send half the prople out of the room.Collect up the eggs and replace them with crisps.Now bring in one person,blindfolded and tell them you are going to lead them round the eggs and tell them when to put their foot down. After leading them for a little while,purposefully let them put their foot down on the crisps.They will then think they have then{"Stepped on the eggs"}and will scream and panic. Do this a couple more times and then take off their blindfold and tell them to sit down quietly. Bring in another person to play the game.
